body: $AAPL was analyzed by 21 analysts. The buy consensus is at 93%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/analyst-ratings?utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking
$AAPL apple car in proccess

$AAPL 🎶 Algorithmic perfection you ain't getting away without detection.... Sketchy green candles at inflection..... 🎶 🎵 Definitely keeping my day job at linework perfection 🎶....😂 🎤 😂 $STUDY $SPY $QQQ 🍀

It is a bullish market, the temporary dips we see are great opportunity to buy, if you are not a bull, you are in the wrong place!  
  
$AAPL $TSLA $SPY $AMD $AMZN

:) 
  
$AAPL $TSLA $SPY $AMD $AMZN

Thought I'd bring some perspective on the valuation of Tesla to its $1T+ market cap tech peers:

$AMZN if this company suddenly disappeared:
-E-commerce, entertainment, private vendors suddenly severely handicapped
-Massive collapse of internet sites (AWS)
-1 Million jobs lost, many more millions indirectly

$MSFT $AAPL $GOOG  if these companies suddenly disappeared:
-Most of home computing, PCs eliminated
-Cloud computing, many internet sites collapse or cease to function
-Day to day applications, E-commerce, communication, entertainment, social media in the US would collapse.  
-Advertising, E-commerce, and many communication tech in the US and in some other countries would collapse
-Navigation, new tech R&D would be severely set back
-Many US-based tech/media/construction/infrastructure systems crumble.

$TSLA if this company suddenly disappeared:
-Some EV's in major western US cities disappear

Disclosure: I own a Tesla Plaid, love the car, but 1.2T market cap... really?
$AAPL There should surely be some upside momentum this coming week.

$AAPL Some possible targets for wave 3 of 3, assuming the uptrend continues. My money is on 158, i.e. where wave 3 of 3 is 1.382 wave 1 of 3. It might reach higher, but the upper bollinger band will be resistance.

Grandpa is still worried about Italy's Crown Prince and the Stock Market as well!  
Some folks will be living in fear of a market "downturn" all of their lives, they will die poor. 
  
$AAPL $TSLA $SPY $AMD $AMZN
$GGPI if $AAPL  does a deal to mass produce EVs its with us.

Trading is 90% mindset🌟so mindset is the one thing that is needed to make all other components of your trading plan work. Join me and my top student tonight at 8pm. (NASDAQ: $AAPL), ( $BRK) – Warren Buffett Has Spent More On Buybacks of Berkshire Hathaway Stock Than Adding To Position In Apple https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/apple-inc-nasdaqaapl-brk-warren-buffett-has-spent-more-on-buybacks-of-berkshire-hathaway-stock-than-adding-to-position-in-apple/

links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), (BRK) - Warren Buffett Has Spent More On Buybacks of Berkshire Hathaway Stock Than Adding To Position In Apple
links.description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc (NYSE: BRK) has spent more money on buying back its own stock than adding to its position in the company's biggest equity holding Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL). What Happened: Since the middle of 2018 through the end of 2020, Berkshire allocated $20 billion more for buybacks than purchasing additional shares of Apple.
